yakaoma geometry: Chidzidzo chezvimiro zvejometri uye zvivakwa zvinobva, kana zvinotsanangurwa nenhamba dzakaoma
nhamba dzakaoma: Nhamba dzechimiro a + bi apo a na b dziri nhamba chaidzo
chikamu chaicho: Izwi riri munhamba yakaoma isina chimiro chekufungidzira sechinhu
chikamu chekufungidzira: Chikamu chenhamba yakaoma ine chikamu chekufungidzira sechinhu
yakaoma manifolds: Nzvimbo dzakaoma geometry dziri generalizations yemacurves uye nzvimbo
yakaoma algebraic marudzi: Nzvimbo mune yakaoma geometry idzo mhinduro dzepolynomial equations
holomorphic zvivakwa: Zvivakwa mune yakaoma geometry iyo yakaoma-inosiyana
purogiramu shoma yemuenzaniso: Chirongwa mune yakaoma geometry yekuisa kupatsanurwa kweakaomarara manifolds uye yakaoma algebraic marudzi
moduli nzvimbo: Nzvimbo mune yakaoma geometry iyo parameterise imwe mhando yejometri chinhu
calabi kufungidzira: Fungidziro mune yakaoma geometry inopupurirwa naShing-Tung Yau nezve kuvapo kwemhando yakakosha yemetric pane yakaoma manifold.
hitchin-kobayashi tsamba: Kunyorerana mune yakaoma geometry pakati yakagadzikana holomorphic vector masumbu uye mhinduro kune imwe mutsauko equation.
nonabelian hodge tsamba: Kunyorerana mune yakaoma geometry pakati pemamwe marudzi eakaomesesa manifolds uye mamwe marudzi ealgebraic zvimiro
zvakanakar-einstein metrics: Mhando dzakakosha dzemetrics pane yakaoma manifold inogutsa imwe mamiriro
